plays.text: Penalty to David Karpa 2 minutes for Tripping Simon Gagne

Penalty to Eric Desjardins 2 minutes for High Sticking Theo Fleury

Goal scored by Petr Nedved assisted by Vladimir Malakhov and Brian Leetch
Penalty to Mark Messier 2 minutes for Holding John LeClair
